Items.MatterName: The creation of a boilerplate annual checklist for parking garage inspections prior to initial annual condition inspections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the frequency of parking structure inspections

Items.MatterName: Requiring asbestos surveys and abatement after certain catastrophic events.
